filmography.title: My Friend Irma
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking juice bar operator and singer who discovers a talent in his partner; Martin's film debut with Jerry Lewis.
filmography.plot: A scatterbrained woman meddles in the lives of her roommate and their neighbors, including a duo of aspiring entertainers.

filmography.title: At War with the Army
filmography.role_description: A suave First Sergeant trying to transfer out of his unit while dealing with his bumbling subordinate.
filmography.plot: A comedy about the mishaps of two friends, a sergeant and a private, stationed at an army base during WWII.

filmography.title: Sailor Beware
filmography.role_description: A sailor who schemes to avoid work while helping his hypochondriac friend gain a reputation as a lady-killer.
filmography.plot: A sailor bets that his bumbling friend can get a kiss from a famous French cabaret singer.

filmography.title: The Stooge
filmography.role_description: An arrogant song-and-dance man who mistreats his partner, reflecting the real-life tensions of the duo.
filmography.plot: A struggling vaudeville performer hires a 'stooge' to sit in the audience and heckle him, but the stooge becomes the star.

filmography.title: The Caddy
filmography.role_description: A suave golf instructor whose singing career is launched by the famous song 'That's Amore'.
filmography.plot: A gifted golfer who is afraid of crowds coaches his brother-in-law to success, leading to a comedy act.

filmography.title: Scared Stiff
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer who flees to Cuba with his partner to escape a mobster, encountering ghosts and voodoo.
filmography.plot: A singer and a busboy flee mobsters and end up on a spooky island inherited by an heiress.

filmography.title: Artists and Models
filmography.role_description: A struggling painter who uses his roommate's comic book obsessions for inspiration.
filmography.plot: An artist uses his roommate's sleep-talking dreams to create a successful comic book series, attracting spies and models.

filmography.title: Hollywood or Bust
filmography.role_description: A New York gambler who scams a movie fan and joins him on a road trip to Hollywood; the final Martin & Lewis film.
filmography.plot: A gambler and a movie fanatic share a car won in a raffle and drive cross-country to meet Anita Ekberg.

filmography.title: The Young Lions
filmography.role_description: A Broadway singer who tries to dodge the draft but eventually faces the horrors of war; Martin's dramatic breakthrough.
filmography.plot: The destiny of three soldiers during World War II: a German officer, a Jewish-American G.I., and a showbiz crooner.

filmography.title: Some Came Running
filmography.role_description: A professional gambler and southern good ol' boy who befriends a disillusioned writer (Frank Sinatra).
filmography.plot: A veteran returns home to the small town he left years before and finds himself torn between two women and befriended by a gambler.

filmography.title: Rio Bravo
filmography.role_description: A disgraced, alcoholic deputy sheriff who fights to regain his sobriety and self-respect while helping John Wayne.
filmography.plot: A small-town sheriff enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

filmography.title: Career
filmography.role_description: A ruthless Hollywood director who betrays a struggling actor to advance his own career.
filmography.plot: An aspiring actor struggles for years to make it in New York, facing betrayal and hardship.

filmography.title: Who Was That Lady?
filmography.role_description: A TV writer who helps his friend concoct a wild spy story to cover up marital infidelity.
filmography.plot: A chemistry professor's wife catches him kissing a student, so his friend helps him invent a cover story that he is an FBI agent.

filmography.title: Bells Are Ringing
filmography.role_description: A playwright suffering from writer's block who falls in love with his answering service operator.
filmography.plot: An answering service operator gets involved in the lives of her clients, falling for a playwright in the process.

filmography.title: Ocean's 11
filmography.role_description: A lounge singer and demolition expert who joins Danny Ocean's crew to rob five Las Vegas casinos.
filmography.plot: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist.

filmography.title: Ada
filmography.role_description: A guitar-playing reform candidate for governor who is manipulated by political bosses and his ambitious wife.
filmography.plot: A call girl helps her husband get elected governor, then takes over when he is sidelined.

filmography.title: Toys in the Attic
filmography.role_description: A charming but irresponsible man who returns home with a child bride, disrupting the lives of his spinster sisters.
filmography.plot: A man returns to his family home in New Orleans with a young wife, stirring up old jealousies and secrets.

filmography.title: 4 for Texas
filmography.role_description: A dashing gambler who competes with Frank Sinatra's character for money and control of a gambling town.
filmography.plot: Two rivals compete to open a casino in Galveston, Texas, while dealing with a corrupt banker and an outlaw.

filmography.title: What a Way to Go!
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, workaholic department store owner who becomes one of Shirley MacLaine's ill-fated husbands.
filmography.plot: A four-time widow discusses her four marriages, in which all of her husbands became incredibly rich and died prematurely.

filmography.title: Robin and the 7 Hoods
filmography.role_description: A pool-hustling gangster who joins a charitable crime syndicate in Prohibition-era Chicago.
filmography.plot: A Chicago gangster tries to maintain his territory against a rival while becoming a philanthropic hero to the public.

filmography.title: Kiss Me, Stupid
filmography.role_description: A famous, womanizing pop singer stranded in a small town, playing a self-parody of his public image.
filmography.plot: A jealous piano teacher hires a prostitute to pose as his wife to sell a song to a famous singer.

filmography.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
filmography.role_description: A gambler and the black sheep of four brothers who reunite to investigate their mother's death and father's murder.
filmography.plot: Four brothers reunite at their mother's funeral and are determined to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother's land.

filmography.title: The Silencers
filmography.role_description: A retired secret agent turned photographer who is pulled back into service to stop a nuclear threat; the first of four Helm films.
filmography.plot: Secret agent Matt Helm is coaxed out of retirement to stop an evil organization from starting a nuclear war.

filmography.title: Bandolero!
filmography.role_description: An outlaw who, along with his brother (James Stewart), kidnaps a woman and flees into Mexico.
filmography.plot: Two brothers rob a bank and flee across the Mexican border with a hostage, pursued by a sheriff.

filmography.title: Airport
filmography.role_description: An arrogant, womanizing pilot who must land a damaged 707 during a blizzard after a bomb detonates on board.
filmography.plot: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

filmography.title: The Cannonball Run
filmography.role_description: A race car driver disguised as a priest who participates in an illegal cross-country race; one of his final film hits.
filmography.plot: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race.
